An AI agent, as illustrated in Figure 6-2 on page 91, consists of a centralized planning system that is supported by a general-purpose generative LLM. This LLM serves as the core orchestrator, which can devise a structured plan of actions to address user queries. Its decision-making process is enhanced by a memory module, which maintains contextual information and is continuously updated based on past actions and outcomes, which help ensure adaptive and dynamic responses.
